hero.headline: Purity You Can Taste
hero.description: Traditionally sourced, naturally processed. From our farm to your kitchen.

highlights.oils_description: Mustard and Groundnut oil available in sizes from 500ml up to 15L and in Kg units for wholesale. Rich in omega fatty acids and antioxidants.
highlights.spices_description: A full range of whole spices, unadulterated and full of aroma. Directly sourced from trusted local farms.
highlights.spices_list: Turmeric, Coriander Seeds, Cloves, Cardamom, Cumin Seeds, Black Peppercorns, Cinnamon Sticks

about.title: About Madhuban Traders
about.story_text: Madhuban Traders is a trusted supplier of high-quality, authentically sourced groceries and trading supplies. For over a decade, we've been committed to providing the finest cold-pressed oils and whole spices directly from farms to retailers and wholesalers across the region.
about.mission_text: We believe in transparency, quality, and sustainability. Every product we offer is carefully selected and processed to maintain its natural nutritional value and authentic flavor.
about.why_1: 100% Cold-Pressed: Our oils are extracted using traditional cold-pressing methods
about.why_2: Farm-to-Table: Direct relationships with local farmers
about.why_3: Bulk Availability: Flexible sizing from 500ml to 15L
about.why_4: Certified Quality: All products meet food safety standards
about.oils_text: Mustard Oil, Groundnut Oil in various sizes
about.spices_text: Turmeric, Cardamom, Cumin, Cinnamon, and more
about.journey_text: Madhuban Traders' journey began in 2024 with a vision to bring traditionally cold-pressed oils and natural spices to the world. Our founders' goal was simple — connect farmers directly to retailers and wholesalers, eliminate middlemen, and ensure the highest quality. Today, we proudly serve thousands of customers and have earned their trust through transparency and authenticity.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your trust is our priority. We're committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy.intro_text: At Madhuban Traders, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience on our website and when purchasing our products.
privacy.intro_paragraph: Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our website.

collect_personal_items.name_email: Name, email address, phone number, mailing address
collect_personal_items.order_history: Order history, payment details, shipping address

privacy.device_info_items: Browser type, IP address, operating system, device type
privacy.usage_data_items: Pages visited, time spent, clicks, navigation patterns

use.send_updates: Send order confirmations and shipping updates

privacy.share_intro: We may share your information with:

share.service_providers_items: Payment processors, shipping partners, email service providers
share.no_sell: We do NOT sell or rent your personal information to third parties.

privacy.security_paragraph: We implement appropriate technical, administrative, and physical security measures to protect your personal information.
privacy.rights_paragraph: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

rights.deletion: Right to request deletion of data

privacy.cookies_paragraph: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience.
privacy.children_paragraph: Our website is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
privacy.contact_paragraph: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
privacy.address: Madhuban Traders, Sindhora Bazar, Varanasi 221208, India
privacy.changes_paragraph: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through prominent notice on our website.
